org.texgen.utils
Class RGBAColor

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.utils.RGBAColor

public class RGBAColor
extends java.lang.Object

Class representing colors using Red,Green,Blue and Alpha values. Includes methods to modify and merge colors.

Author:
Andy Gibson
